list_definition.definition: something, usually a heavy piece of metal with points which dig into the seabed, used to hold a boat in one position

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: a safe place to drop anchor.

list_definition.definition: something that holds someone or something steady.
to hold (a boat etc) steady (with an anchor)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They have anchored (the boat) near the shore
He used a stone to anchor his papers.
